meanings.definition: A type of lipid found in cell membranes.
meanings.sent1: The sphingosines help make up the protective layer around the cell.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the role of sphingosines in maintaining cell structure.
meanings.sent3: The sphingosines in the cell membrane were having a party, dancing to the beat of the cell's rhythm.
meanings.sent4: Like a sturdy wall, the sphingosines in the membrane provide support and protection to the cell.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the sphingosines as the guards of the cell, always vigilant and ready to defend.

meanings.definition: A class of compounds with a long hydrocarbon chain.
meanings.sent1: The sphingosines are known for their long, chain-like structure.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are exploring the various properties of sphingosines in chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The sphingosines gathered together, forming a long chain that stretched across the laboratory.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, the sphingosines stand out with their unique, lengthy chains.
meanings.sent5: Picture the sphingosines as the long highways of the chemical world, connecting different compounds.
